columnDefinitions.name: Name
columnDefinitions.description: Custom resource definition column (in JSONPath format): {.metadata.name}

columnDefinitions.name: Namespace
columnDefinitions.description: Custom resource definition column (in JSONPath format): {.metadata.namespace}

columnDefinitions.name: Labels
columnDefinitions.description: Custom resource definition column (in JSONPath format): {.metadata.labels}

columnDefinitions.name: Annotations
columnDefinitions.description: Custom resource definition column (in JSONPath format): {.metadata.annotations}

columnDefinitions.name: Selector
columnDefinitions.description: Custom resource definition column (in JSONPath format): {.spec.selector}

columnDefinitions.name: Strategy
columnDefinitions.description: Custom resource definition column (in JSONPath format): {.spec.strategy.type}

columnDefinitions.name: Min Ready Seconds
columnDefinitions.description: Custom resource definition column (in JSONPath format): {.spec.minReadySeconds}

columnDefinitions.name: Revision History Limit
columnDefinitions.description: Custom resource definition column (in JSONPath format): {.spec.revisionHistoryLimit}

columnDefinitions.name: Rolling Update Strategy
columnDefinitions.description: Custom resource definition column (in JSONPath format): {.spec.strategy.rollingUpdate}

columnDefinitions.name: Status
columnDefinitions.description: Custom resource definition column (in JSONPath format): {.status.updatedReplicas} updated, {.status.replicas} total, {.status.availableReplicas} available, {.status.unavailableReplicas} unavailable

columnDefinitions.name: Desired Replicas
columnDefinitions.description: Custom resource definition column (in JSONPath format): {.spec.replicas}
